C

CHARSET_NAME - Static variable in class universum.studios.android.crypto.Cryptography
Name of the default charset used for cryptographic operations (encryption, decryption) when obtaining byte[] data form a String value via String.getBytes(String).
Crypto - Interface in universum.studios.android.crypto
Crypto defines an interface for implementations that may be used to provide two-side cryptographic operations: encryption and decryption of a desired data.
Cryptography - Class in universum.studios.android.crypto
 
CryptographyException - Exception in universum.studios.android.crypto
An exception that may be thrown due to failed cryptographic operation.
CryptographyException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception universum.studios.android.crypto.CryptographyException
Creates a new instance of CryptographyException with the specified cause.
CryptographyException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception universum.studios.android.crypto.CryptographyException
Creates a new instance of CryptographyException with the specified name and cause.
CryptographyUtils - Class in universum.studios.android.crypto.util
Class providing utility methods that may be used for simple encryption and decryption.

D

decrypt(byte[]) - Method in interface universum.studios.android.crypto.Decrypto
Performs decryption operation for the specified data.
decrypt(String, Decrypto) - Static method in class universum.studios.android.crypto.util.CryptographyUtils
Performs decryption operation for the specified String value using the given decrypto.
Decrypto - Interface in universum.studios.android.crypto
Decrypto defines an interface for implementations that may be used to provide one-side cryptographic operation: decryption of a desired data that are encrypted.

E

encrypt(byte[]) - Method in interface universum.studios.android.crypto.Encrypto
Performs encryption operation for the specified data.
encrypt(String, Encrypto) - Static method in class universum.studios.android.crypto.util.CryptographyUtils
Performs encryption operation for the specified String value using the given encrypto.
Encrypto - Interface in universum.studios.android.crypto
Encrypto defines an interface for implementations that may be used to provide one-side cryptographic operation: encryption of a desired data that are decrypted.

U

universum.studios.android.crypto - package universum.studios.android.crypto
Provides tools that may be used to support cryptographic operations in an Android application.
universum.studios.android.crypto.util - package universum.studios.android.crypto.util
Package providing cryptographic utilities.
